title: Health Data Visualization
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to view graphical representations of my clients' health metrics so that I can make informed decisions about their care.

title: Care Task Management
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to create, assign, and track care tasks for my clients so that I can ensure all necessary care activities are completed on time.

title: Emergency Contact Notifications
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to configure emergency contact notifications so that I can ensure timely alerts are sent to designated individuals during critical health incidents.

title: Health Insights and Recommendations
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want ALFRED to analyze health data and provide me with insights and recommendations so that I can improve the care and wellness of my clients.

title: Secure Data Sharing
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to securely share health data with authorized medical staff so that I can ensure my clients receive the best possible care while maintaining their privacy.

title: User Feedback Mechanism
summary: As a caregiver, I want to provide feedback on ALFRED's functionalities so that I can suggest improvements that enhance my efficiency in monitoring clients and coordinating care.
